Svvord and buckler, or, Seruing-mans defence. By William Bas Basse, William, d. ca. 1653.
[32] p.
Imprinted [by Felix Kingston] for M. L[ownes] and are to be sold at his shop in S. Dunstons Churchyard, At London : 1602.
In verse. Printer's and publisher's names from STC. Signatures: A-D⁴. Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
